an6.66:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.66:1.3: Thinam, middham, uddhaccam, kukkuccam, assaddhiyam, pamadam—
an6.66:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.66:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an6.66:2.3: Thinam, middham, uddhaccam, kukkuccam, assaddhiyam, pamadam—
an6.66:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
